In asking their fellows to believe in Jesus Christ the Son of God and to commit themselves to Him in life and death, the Apostles became responsible for all who should obey them in their own age and in all ages. And the Apostles were well aware of this immense responsibility, An immense responsibility, indeed, it has become, for, as a simple matter of fact, Jesus Christ has now taken His seat at the right hand of the Majesty of God. There is no serious rival to-day to that manifestation of God which the world received in Christ. There are masses of men, alas! who deny all reality to the things of saith and of the Spirit‚ for whom there is no Heavenlvy throne, or if there is such a throne, it is vacant.
